title: Hoax
description: She's spent a long time in a bubble. In an odd turn of events, Corinne is taken out of boarding school and plunged into high school where bullies reign and nice guys come in last. But this is after she's already fallen in love with Abel over the summer.Abel is trapped, with friends he secretly hates, but has chosen to stay with the status quo. It's just high school, right? What do you do when the person you love sees the very worst part of you? And how do you help them when they discover their life is a hoax?
author: Lila Felix
